Class Drone

java.lang.Object
Drone
Direct Known Subclasses:
DJI
public abstract class Drone
extends java.lang.Object
Project: Swarm Capstone : General category and attributes of the drone sub-classes

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private int attack
    the warriors total attack
    private java.awt.Color color
    the color of the warriors alliance (individually assigned for creativity later)
    private int courage
    how unlikely they are to run away from a battle
    (package private) static int[] DJIStats
    the attributes of an archer (health, min and max attack, min and max speed, min and max courage, size, and range

    the x firing coordinate of target drone

    the warriors total health at any given point

  • Method Details

    • move

      public abstract void move​(int xTarget, int yTarget, int zTarget)
      Moves the warrior in the direction of the target x and y in proportion to it's speed
      Parameters:
      xTarget - The x coordinate of the target enemy soldier
      yTarget - The y coordinate of the target enemy soldier
      zTarget - The y coordinate of the target enemy soldier

    • draw

      public abstract void draw​(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
      puts the selected warrior on the screen with its assigned x, y, size, and color
      Parameters:
      g - The graphics window to be written to

      public void drawTracking​(java.awt.Graphics2D g)

      g - the graphics panel to draw on
